translation.en: [Vee] I'm reading the news, thank you very much.
[Vee chuckling] Seriously, how do you know I'm stalking JP?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabes que estaba acosando a JP?

translation.en: Because I know you very, very well.
Oh, wait! Did you tell your mom 'bout CalArts yet?
translation.es: ¿Le has dicho a tu madre lo de CalArts?

translation.en: Yeah, I told her. She's super excited for me to move across the country
translation.es: Sí, está encantada de que vaya a la otra punta del país

translation.en: and go to a really expensive art school.
translation.es: a una facultad de las caras.

translation.en: No, I haven't found... I haven't found the right time to tell her.
[Sydney] It's a game. Here, just click on the video.
translation.es: Un juego, haz clic en el vídeo.

translation.en: [male computer] Welcome to Nerve New York City.
Like Truth or Dare, minus the truth.
translation.es: Como Verdad o Reto pero sin lo de verdad.

translation.en: Players play to win cash and glory.
translation.es: Los jugadores juegan por dinero y gloria.

translation.en: Are you a Watcher or a Player?
Are you a Watcher or a Player?
Are you a Watcher or a Player?
This looks very sketchy. Is this legal?
Just do it. Just sign up and watch. Time's ticking.
translation.es: Regístrate y verás. Se pasa el tiempo.

translation.en: Okay, signing up. Look, this is me signing up to watch you.
translation.es: Mira, me estoy registrando para verte.

translation.en: Vee! You have to sign up and watch me. -[door closes] -It's very important that I have Watchers.
translation.es: Tienes que verme. Es muy importante tener observadores.

translation.en: [Nancy] Hey. [Vee] I gotta go, my mom just got home. I'll sign up after breakfast. I promise.
translation.es: Te dejo, ha llegado mi madre. Lo hago después, prometido.

translation.en: Thank you. I love you. I'll see you in a little bit.
[Vee] I mean, Syd hasn't gotten into any schools yet.
translation.es: A Syd no la han admitido en ninguna facultad.

translation.en: You know what? Sydney doesn't have to care. She has a trust fund.
translation.es: No necesita preocuparse, su familia tiene dinero.

translation.en: And you have something far more valuable than that.
translation.es: Y tú vales más que eso.

translation.en: You have drive, you have focus.
You have a scholarship to a local college.
translation.es: Tienes beca para una universidad local.

translation.en: And even though we can't afford the dorm,
translation.es: Y aun así, no podemos pagar la residencia,

translation.en: you get to have me as your new college roommate.
translation.es: tendremos que ser compis de habitación.

translation.en: I had kind of a cool idea about that.
translation.es: se me ocurre algo para eso.

translation.en: What if we fixed up Mike's room and listed you on Airbnb or something?
translation.es: ¿Y si arreglamos el cuarto de Mike y lo alquilamos en Airbnb?

translation.en: Maybe it's time we finally go through his stuff
translation.es: Tal vez sea hora de quitar sus cosas

translation.en: and maybe give some of it to Goodwill.
And I could give you some space.
I'm totally down with commuting. I can... I can get my reading done on the ferry.
translation.es: Me mola el transporte público, puedo leer en el ferri.

translation.en: [Hype Boi] Let's say, "Go Cougars" on the count of 1, 2, 3.
translation.es: Decimos Vamos, Cougars a la de tres.

translation.en: Doesn't it feel a little unbalanced
if every single yearbook photo is of JP Guerrero?
translation.es: poner todos los años la foto de JP?

translation.en: It's not my fault he's on the team.
translation.es: No tengo la culpa de que esté en el equipo.

translation.en: All right, let's go! Let's go! Come on!
[Tommy] Watch out, watch out, watch out!
You got it. Yeah, you got it. All right, be careful. Careful.
[Hype Boi] Show 'em what we got, Cougars!
[Sydney] Are you ready? Remember what to do?
I'm counting on you to get me to the final round.
translation.es: Cuento con vosotros para llegar a la final.

translation.en: So don't let me down and I won't let you down, I promise.
translation.es: No me decepcionéis y no os decepcionaré, lo prometo.

translation.en: [Hype Boi] Go, dude! Show 'em what we got!
Show 'em what Staten Island's really about!
translation.es: ¡Que sepan cómo somos en Staten Island!

translation.en: [Hype Boi] Ooh! How 'bout that ass, though?
Ah... You guys dared me to eat dog food.
translation.es: Me habéis retado a comer comida para perros.

translation.en: -This is so gross. This is so gross. -Don't think about it.
I have so many Watchers now.
I just need to get in that little box thing. Who's winning now?
translation.es: Necesito entrar en esa lista. ¿Quién va primero?

translation.en: I guess he put peanut butter on his junk and let his dog lick it off.
translation.es: Se pondría dulce en el pito para que se lo lamiera el perro.

translation.en: But you don't have a dog.
[Liv] Ooh, they're coming up with your next dare!
What is it? I need something flashy like the peanut butter thing.
translation.es: Necesito algo llamativo como el dulce en el pito.

translation.en: How do they know you're afraid of heights?
translation.es: ¿Cómo saben que tienes miedo a las alturas?

translation.en: They just take all your info from your old profiles and put it in your Nerve profile.
translation.es: Cogen información de tus perfiles y la introducen en Nerve.

translation.en: You just got suspended. I thought you were done playing Nerve.
translation.es: Ya te han expulsado, pensé que habías dejado Nerve.

translation.en: The girl who won Seattle now has millions of followers.
translation.es: La de Seattle tiene millones de seguidores.
¿A quién le importa? A mí, Vee.

translation.en: I don't expect you to understand.
You like to stay within your comfort zone. That's fine.
translation.es: Tú prefieres quedarte en tu zona de confort.

translation.en: That's not true. What about that pole dancing class we took?
translation.es: No es verdad, ¿y las clases de pole dance a las que fuimos?

translation.en: Vee, I dragged you there and you sat in the corner and watched.
translation.es: Te llevé a rastras y te quedabas mirando.

translation.en: -I'm not attacking her, Tommy. -Yeah, you are.
translation.es: No me meto con ella, Tommy.

translation.en: You need to learn to take a few risks every once in a while.
translation.es: Hay que arriesgarse de vez en cuando.

translation.en: Let's just say hypothetically you're playing Nerve.
What'd be a good Nerve dare for Vee?
translation.es: ¿Cuál sería un buen reto para Vee?

translation.en: You'll just never know if you don't talk to him.
translation.es: No lo sabrás si no hablas con él.

translation.en: [Wes] And then everybody that's watching you, they would just go on and vote.
translation.es: Y los que te vieran, te votarían.

translation.en: Who wants to see Vee mackin' on JP?
translation.es: ¿Quién querría ver a Vee ligando con JP?

translation.en: You guys! [Sydney] All who wanna see Vee macking on JP say, "Yes."
translation.es: Quien quiera ver a Vee ligando con JP, que diga sí.
Sí. - ¿Eso es un no? - Me abstengo.

translation.en: Do you accept your dare, Vee?
What's the point? We're graduating. I...
translation.es: ¿Para qué? Nos vamos a graduar ya…

translation.en: All you have to do is say, "Hi."
I don't want to say hello to him.
I love you so much, Vee. But you're a watcher.
translation.es: Te quiero mucho, Vee, pero eres solo observadora.

translation.en: So watch me do it for you.
-No, no, no, Syd, Syd, Syd. -[Sydney] Just watch.
Why don't you show us the front next time?
You first, Chuck. I hear it's really big.
translation.es: Tú primero, dicen que la tienes grande.

translation.en: Um... I was wondering. Do you have a girlfriend right now?
It's not for me. It's for a friend.
translation.es: No es por mí, es por una amiga.

translation.en: No, it's... She's not my type.
You're not nearly as hot as you think you are.
translation.es: No estás tan bueno como crees.

translation.en: -[Chuck] Yes, he is! -And you are a douchebag.
I'm just trying to help her.
The two Players with the most Watchers by the end of regulation
translation.es: Los dos jugadores con más observadores al terminar el juego

translation.en: will advance to the final round, where the winner takes all.
translation.es: llegarán a la final donde solo uno se llevará todo.
Se puede ser observador desde cualquier lugar,

translation.en: but they are encouraged to film live. So don't be alarmed.
translation.es: pero hay que grabar en directo. No os alarméis.

translation.en: One, all dares must be filmed on the Player's phone.
translation.es: 1. Todo reto deber ser grabado con el teléfono del jugador.

translation.en: Two, there are only two ways to be eliminated.
translation.es: 2. Solo hay dos maneras de ser eliminado.

translation.en: Thank you for keeping Nerve a secret.
translation.es: Gracias por mantener Nerve en secreto.

translation.en: [voicemail] Hey, this is Vee, I'm not here right now...
translation.es: PERFIL DE JUGADOR DE NY VEE_99

translation.en: [Sydney] Vee! You have to sign up and watch me.
-Tommy. -[Tommy] Hey, I'm pulling up outside. What the hell's so urgent?
We have to go to Colonnade Diner.
translation.es: Tenemos que llegar a Colonnade en 15 minutos.

translation.en: -We have 15 minutes. -[Tommy] Why? What's going on?
I signed up for Nerve and that's where my first dare is.
translation.es: Me he apuntado a Nerve, es mi primer reto.

translation.en: What do you mean? You signed up as a Player?
What? Is that so hard to believe?
You know that some kid supposedly died in Seattle playing Nerve?
translation.es: ¿Sabes que un tío murió en Seattle jugando a Nerve?

translation.en: Oh, I don't buy that. If kids were dying, the game would be shut down.
translation.es: No me lo trago, si muriera alguien cerrarían el garito.

translation.en: No, they can't shut it down. There's not a single server.
translation.es: No pueden cerrarlo, no es un servidor único.

translation.en: Everybody that logs onto the game becomes a new server.
translation.es: Cada participante se convierte en un nuevo servidor.

translation.en: So it's impossible to turn the game off.
How do you even know so much about this game? You've never even played.
Look, I spend a lot of time on the dark web, all right?
translation.es: Me paso horas en la red profunda.

translation.en: Oh, a lot of time on the dark web? Is that right, hacker boy?
Yes, that is right. You're only accessing 10% of the Internet, you know.
translation.es: Sí, solo accedemos al 10 % de la red en realidad.

translation.en: Why are you even doing this? Seriously, it's dangerous.
translation.es: ¿Por qué haces esto? En serio, es peligroso.

translation.en: This is not about Sydney. I'm...
-Kiss a stranger for five seconds? -A stranger?
[sighs] Okay, okay. You're just gonna kiss some random person?
translation.es: - Vale. - ¿Vas a besar a un extraño?

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna kiss that guy.
translation.es: Vale, voy a besar a ese.

translation.en: Well, make a choice. Clock's ticking.
Okay, you sit here. Tell me when you're rolling, 'kay?
To the Lighthouse, that's my favourite book.
Please, tell me they get to the lighthouse in the end.
translation.es: Dime que llegan al faro al final.

translation.en: Uh... Okay, just tell me real quick.
Yeah, they do, but that's... That's not really what it's about.
translation.es: Llegan, pero no es el asunto.

translation.en: The lighthouse means something different to each of the characters.
translation.es: El faro significa algo distinto para cada personaje.

translation.en: It basically represents the thing they want most in life.
translation.es: Representa lo que más desean en la vida.

translation.en: And I'm sorry that I'm totally geeking out and ruining the story.
translation.es: Perdona, he metido la pata y me he cargado la historia.

translation.en: No, I was the one who asked.
[Tommy, muffled] One Mississippi, two Mississippi, three Mississippi, four Mississippi, five Mississippi.
I can't believe I just did that!
Shut up! Oh. Gosh, why am I embarrassed?
Yeah, it was a miniseries. I got all six episodes.
translation.es: Sí, ha sido como una miniserie de seis episodios.

translation.en: "Vee, $100 has been wired to your account."
translation.es: Vee, se han transferido 100 dólares a tu cuenta.

translation.en: ♪ Every time I look Into your lovely eyes ♪
translation.es: Cada vez que miro esos ojos tuyos encantadores…

translation.en: ♪ I see a love that money just can't buy ♪
translation.es: …veo un amor que no se puede comprar.

translation.en: No, it's a dare. It's a dare.
♪ Anything you want, you've got it ♪
translation.es: Todo lo que quieras, es tuyo.

translation.en: ♪ Anything you need, you've got it ♪
translation.es: Todo lo que necesites, es tuyo.

translation.en: Mine was totally embarrassing, but, hey, at least I got 100 bucks, right?
translation.es: El mío daba mucho corte pero he conseguido 100 pavos.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I promise I didn't know what was comin'. You mind?
translation.es: Perdona, no sé lo que iba a pasar. ¿Te importa?

translation.en: Sorry, I'm sitting here. They just told me to sit in that booth and... Sorry.
translation.es: - Perdona, es mi asiento. - Me dijeron que me sentara y…

translation.en: Um... Some kid came by and gave me that book.
translation.es: Un chico vino y me dio ese libro.

translation.en: To the Lighthouse, yeah, my favourite.
[Tommy] Exactly. Because it's on your Facebook page.
They know all the information about you, Vee.
translation.es: Lo saben todo de ti, Vee.

translation.en: Well, her parents, they named her after the Goddess of Love.
translation.es: Sus padres se lo pusieron por la Diosa del Amor.

translation.en: Yeah, I guess my mom was expecting somebody else.
translation.es: Supongo que mi madre esperaba otra cosa.

translation.en: I dunno about that. That was some kiss.
translation.es: No estoy muy puesto, pero vaya beso.

translation.en: I got a game to play. But good night to you guys.
translation.es: Tengo que seguir jugando, buenas noches.

translation.en: Apparently, the Watchers like us together.
translation.es: Al parecer les gusta vernos juntos.

translation.en: I mean, you can't even go to the city, right?
translation.es: A ti no te dejan ir al centro.

translation.en: You know, I can't go to the city, yeah.
I'm not even playing, I was just doing one dare.
translation.es: Además, no estoy jugando, era solo un reto.

translation.en: He always tell you what to do?
translation.es: ¿Siempre te dice lo que tienes que hacer?

translation.en: I'm gonna be outside if you change your mind. It's nice to meet you, Vee.
translation.es: Estaré fuera por si cambias de idea. Encantado de conocerte, Vee.

translation.en: He thought that those were our fries.
Vee, you're not going to the city.
You know what? Charles Manson was a singer.
I'm just warning you, I don't think I'd make a very good partner.
translation.es: Solo te aviso, no creo que sea buena compañera.

translation.en: You should team up with my friend Sydney, actually. She's obsessed with playing Nerve.
translation.es: Deberías hacerlo con mi amiga Sydney, está enganchada a Nerve.

translation.en: But the Watchers want me to team up with you.
translation.es: Pero los observadores quieren que sea contigo.

translation.en: The second I feel uncomfortable, I'm out.
[Sydney] I just have to go to the bathroom.
-[women screaming] -[farting] Please, let me fart on you. Please!
translation.es: Dejadme que os tire un pedo.

translation.en: Well, I mean, I was gonna say you, but... Now I don't know.
translation.es: Iba a decir que tú, pero ahora no sé.

translation.en: Yeah, she's playing Nerve and she has, like, a lot of Watchers.
translation.es: Sí, está jugando y tiene mogollón de observadores.

translation.en: Am I supposed to come in with you?
Well, thank you for the lift.
I'm tired, so I'm probably just gonna make my way back home.
translation.es: Estoy cansada, me voy ya a casa.

translation.en: If you keep up the exercises, you're gonna get really strong on that.
translation.es: Si sigues con los ejercicios se acabará fortaleciendo.
Alguien le ha ingresado dinero a Vee.

translation.en: So thank you so much for shopping at Bergdorf's.
-You have a wonderful day. -Excuse me. Um... Sorry.
Do you know where I can find this dress?

translation.es: Por favor, no desnude al maniquí.

translation.en: Would you like to try this on?
Let me see if I have it in your size.
If you could hurry up, I'm a little bit late for a party.
translation.es: Tengo prisa, llego tarde a una fiesta.

translation.en: If you need anything else, just let me know.
Hey. What's your email number? I mean your...
translation.es: ¿Cuál es tu número de e-mail? Quiero decir…

translation.en: You, uh... You look very pretty.
I mean you look, you know, hot, or handsome or...
Do you know what we're supposed to do now?

translation.es: que le busquemos unos zapatos, mademoiselle.

translation.en: All right, how 'bout my firstborn son, too? Yeah?
Oh, in that case, I'll take two. One for the city and one for the Hamptons.
translation.es: Me llevo dos, uno para la ciudad y otro para los Hamptons.

translation.en: I'll wrap them up for you right away.
Oh, excuse me, miss! Did you move my clothes in there?
Did you take my stuff? I mean, my wallet, my clothes. Everything's gone.
translation.es: ¿Has cogido mis cosas? Mi cartera, mi ropa, han desaparecido.

translation.en: No, my stuff is gone, too.
Come on, we have to make a run for it.
-Come on, let's go. -I am not shoplifting!
We don't have a choice. Come on!
Okay, technically, it just says we have to leave the store.
translation.es: Técnicamente dice Salir de la tienda.

translation.en: Come on, come on! Let's go!
Sorry, buddy, we need to come through. Sorry.
That's enough, that's enough. Let's go, come on, come on.
Whoa, whoa, hey, stop, stop, stop!
Please tell me these are our clothes!
translation.es: Por favor, dime que es nuestra ropa.

translation.en: Hey, can I get the cheque?
Probably one of the Watchers with daddy's credit card.
translation.es: Será un observador con la tarjeta de papá.

translation.en: I'm sorry, was that a Wu-Tang reference?
[Sydney] Tommy, what does Vee think she's doing?
[Liv] Have you ever parked a car in your life?
Why are you asking me? I'm not her boyfriend.
translation.es: ¿A mí qué me cuentas? No soy su novio.

translation.en: [Sydney] Well, who's this biker she's teamed up with?
translation.es: ¿Quién es ese de la moto con el que va?

translation.en: [Tommy] I have no clue. She just ditched me.
translation.es: Ni idea, ha pasado de mí.

translation.en: She's doing what she apparently thinks is best for herself.
translation.es: Hace lo que cree mejor para ella.

translation.en: Yeah, and what exactly is that?

translation.es: Vee está en el Top Ten.

translation.en: [Sydney] Tommy, Vee is in the top 10?
-Yeah, I know. -How is that even possible?
translation.es: Sí, lo sé. ¿Cómo es posible? ¿Cuántos observadores tiene?

translation.en: How many Watchers does she have?

translation.es: Cuatro mil cuatrocientos cuarenta y uno.

translation.en: Oh, okay, I have a lot more.
Tommy, I really don't think that Vee can handle this.
translation.es: Tommy, no creo que Vee pueda con esto.

translation.en: I'm actually really worried about her.
[Sydney] So get your ass to this party and help me, okay?
translation.es: Pues ven a la fiesta y ayúdame.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I'm on my way.
You'd lose everything you've already made.
translation.es: Pierdes todo lo que hayas ganado.

translation.en: Okay, just please no fire-breathing dragons or knives.
translation.es: Por favor, nada de dragones ni navajas.

translation.en: [Dirt Beard] Whoa, whoa, whoa. What about this?
Just a tattoo of my dad.
He's gorgeous, honestly. He's a nice-looking guy.
Ah... Okay. I got a better idea. Here we go. Here we go.
-Vee, quiet. I gotta concentrate! -No! Let me see.
translation.es: - Vee, tengo que concentrarme. - No, déjame ver.

translation.en: Can you do something like this, but less shitty?
translation.es: ¿Puedes hacer algo así pero menos cutre?

translation.en: Hey, you have to trust us. That's the whole thing.
translation.es: Tienes que confiar en nosotros, es la cosa.

translation.en: -[tattoo machine whirring] -[Vee on video] Ow! Ow! Okay. Okay.
I think you can stop. I think we're good. We're good.
The dare said it just had to be bigger than a quarter.
translation.es: El reto dice más grande que una moneda.

translation.en: This definitely feels bigger than a quarter.
You're doin' great. It's almost done.
Okay, no, I think wherever we're at, we can just stop.
translation.es: Creo que ya no hay marcha atrás.

translation.en: Hold on, I'm just doing the "Y" in "Daddy."
translation.es: Aguanta, solo queda la i de papi.

translation.en: He's kidding. Don't listen to him.
translation.es: Está de coña, no le hagas caso.

translation.en: [Vee] I really don't like that noise. At all.
translation.es: No me gusta ese ruido para nada.

translation.en: ♪ I grew up on the crime side The New York Times side ♪
translation.es: Crecí en el mundo del crimen, en los sucesos del NY Times.

translation.en: ♪ Had secondhands Mom's bounced on old man ♪
♪ So when we moved to Shaolin land ♪
♪ A young youth Yo, rockin' a gold tooth ♪ ♪ 'Lo goose Only way... ♪
translation.es: y allí viví mi juventud. Ropa de marca…

translation.en: My brother used to listen to them all the time.
translation.es: Mi hermano los oía a todas horas.

translation.en: Oh, yeah? You have a brother?
He died right before starting college.
I'm sorry. How long ago was that?
This July, I'll be older than him. Older than my older brother.
translation.es: En julio seré mayor que él, mayor que mi hermano mayor.

translation.en: Hey, hey. Come on. Stay with me. Stay with me.
translation.es: No te muevas, sigue hablando conmigo.

translation.en: He was just one of those people that wasn't afraid of anything.
translation.es: Era de esos que no le tienen miedo a nada.

translation.en: He would laugh so hard if he saw me getting a tattoo right now.
translation.es: Se partiría de risa si me viera haciéndome un tatu.

translation.en: Go to that mirror. Celebrate my work.
translation.es: Mírate en ese espejo. Admira mi obra.

translation.en: -Do I want to see? -Yes, yes, yes.
-Yeah, ha-ha. Hey. -Yo, we miss you down here at the club.
translation.es: Ya, ya. Te echamos de menos por aquí.

translation.en: [Hacker Kween] Yeah, man, we all are.
All right, I'm trying to find out more about this Ian guy.
translation.es: Quiero saber más de ese Ian.

translation.en: Man, he playin' wit' your little girlfriend Vee, right?
translation.es: Está jugando con tu chica, Vee.

translation.en: Could be you, but you're playin'.
All right, yes. That's the problem, though.
But I'm looking at his profile and there's just nothing on the guy.
translation.es: Estoy mirando su perfil y no veo nada.

translation.en: Look, I need a ticket to Aruba.
No way. You're not ready for that shit. -Yes, I know. -You're gonna mess up my rating.
translation.es: - Ni hablar, no estás preparado. - Lo sé.

translation.en: I'm not gonna mess up your rating.
translation.es: - Te vas a cargar mi valoración. - ¡Qué va!

translation.en: I'm not gonna buy guns or something, man. Come on.
translation.es: No voy a comprar armas, tía.

translation.en: I'm... Look, I'm just worried about my friend. Please.
translation.es: Estoy preocupado por mi amiga. Por favor.

translation.en: All right, I'll send you a passkey.
translation.es: Vale, te envío una clave de acceso.

translation.en: A lighthouse? I love it. Thank you. [chuckles]
Well, a very wise person once said...
They said that the lighthouse represents the thing that you want the most.
translation.es: Dijo que el faro representa lo que más deseas.

translation.en: So, whatever that is, I hope you get it.
translation.es: Sea lo que sea, espero que lo consigas.

translation.en: How many followers does she have now?
I mean, to be fair, you did tell her to take a risk.
This isn't what I meant, Liv.
Okay. Now they're asking if I can trust you. Can I?
translation.es: Ahora preguntan si puedo confiar en ti. ¿Puedo?

translation.en: I have the perfect tattoo picked out for you.
translation.es: Tengo el tatu perfecto para ti.

translation.en: No, okay, it's not a tattoo dare.
translation.es: No es un reto de tatu.
Dice: Ve a Park con la 25.

translation.en: Oh, God, I love the Internet.
-[Ian on video] Don't have to do this. -Just shoot it!
[voicemail] Hey, it's Vee. I'm not here right now, so leave a message.
translation.es: Soy Vee, no estoy, deja un mensaje.

translation.en: -[cell phone beeps] -Here we go. Get to 60 miles per hour. That's it.
translation.es: Allá vamos, hay que llegar a 100 por hora.

translation.en: All right. Easy one. All right, let's do this.
You're on your own with that one.
Wait, wait. I can't do this alone.
Come on, I need you to help me navigate.
There is no way in hell I'm doing that.
translation.es: Ni de coña voy a hacer eso.

translation.en: Thank you for tonight. I mean...
I had a lot of fun. Got a new dress. But I...
translation.es: Me lo he pasado bien, tengo un vestido nuevo.

translation.en: Stay. Let's see what else happens.
[Ty] Yo! What's up, guys? Venus, love your work.
translation.es: ¿Qué tal, chicos? Venus, me ha molado tu movida.

translation.en: Would you hold that for me?
And, Ian, see you in the finals.
translation.es: Ian, nos vemos en la final.

translation.en: I don't know. Just another Player.
Vee, come on, do this with me.
[Wes] Who got next? Who wanna challenge the champ? Liv?
Oh, my God, you're not gonna believe this.
translation.es: No te lo vas a creer.
PONTE A 100 POR HORA CON LOS OJOS TAPADOS

translation.en: [Ian] All right, remember, you're my eyes.
Hey, I know you're scared, but you gotta talk to me, Vee.
translation.es: Sé que estás asustada, pero tienes que hablarme.

translation.en: -What's goin' on? Are we good? -[Vee] Taxi to the right.
You have a sticker on your helmet! -[Ian] Thank you! -You're leaning right.

translation.es: Te vas a la derecha. ¡A la izquierda!

translation.en: Okay, okay! Too far left. Right! Right!
[Ian] Okay, I think that worked. Yeah? Are we good?
[Ian] Okay, all right, just keep doin' that.
[Ian] Yes, lean. Left or right. You are in control.
translation.es: Sí, a la derecha o izquierda, ahora controlas tú.

translation.en: [Ian] This is good. You're doin' great! Okay, speed up.
[Ian] Good, good, all right, you got this.
Come on, stay with me. What's goin' on?
[Ian] Are we clear now? [Vee] Still clear.
Take it home, Vee! Take it home, Vee!

translation.es: - ¿Velocidad? - Setenta y dos. Setenta y cuatro.

translation.en: -Hold on! -God, oh, my God! Look out!
[Wes] Best dare ever! Vee is number one!
That was the craziest thing I've ever done. You were incredible.
translation.es: Ha sido lo más loco que he hecho nunca. Has estado increíble.

translation.en: I can't even believe we did that.
-Pizza? -Pizza... I swear, I was gonna say, "Pizza."
translation.es: - ¿Pizza? - Juro que iba a decir pizza.

translation.en: Okay, listen, you and I both know that I should be in that box.
translation.es: Escuchad, sabéis que debería estar en esa lista.

translation.en: So please, stop holding back. Okay?
You guys don't need to be afraid, because I'm not afraid.
translation.es: No tengáis miedo porque yo no lo tengo.

translation.en: So just give me a real dare.
You've got a lot of Watchers. I got a lot of Watchers.
Seems to work for your friend Vee.
translation.es: A tu amiga Vee le va bien.

translation.en: What up, Syd? You all right?
Yo, Mad Max, why don't you show yourself out, man?
translation.es: Mad Max, ¿por qué no te piras?

translation.en: [Nancy] Tommy, listen, I have a quick question.
How would I know if I'm being hacked?
Hacked. Somebody's been depositing money into my account under Vee's name.
translation.es: Alguien está ingresando dinero en mi cuenta a nombre de Vee.

translation.en: That doesn't sound like a hack.
Normally, they would take money out if they were hacking you.
translation.es: Normalmente se llevan el dinero si te hackean.

translation.en: Thomas, what are you not telling me?
Oh! It must... It might be... Vee got a job.
translation.es: Pues será… Vee tiene un trabajo.

translation.en: She did an online poker thing.
-And she's really great at it. -Is it legal?
translation.es: Y se le da muy bien. ¿Es legal?

translation.en: Yeah, it's legal. And she's doing great,
as you can tell with the deposits.
translation.es: como puedes ver en tus ingresos.

translation.en: I'm writing a paper right now on motorcycle safety.
translation.es: Tengo que dejarte, estoy haciendo un trabajo sobre seguridad vial en moto.

translation.en: -I'm gonna get goin', but... -Well, tell her to call me. -Bye. -Bye.
translation.es: - Te dejo. - Dile que me llame. Adiós.

translation.en: [Vee] So, why are you playing Nerve?
Trying to help out my family.
Some things happened that I wish turned out differently.
This is just kinda something I need to do.
translation.es: Es algo que tengo que hacer.

translation.en: -Pick up, pick up. -[Ian] You gonna get it?
I don't wanna deal with her right now.
She's just been a lot recently.
But whatever, you don't wanna talk about that.
If you wanna talk about it, I'm here. Happy to listen.
translation.es: Si quieres hablar, aquí estoy. Te escucho encantado.

translation.en: I'm just tired of being her sidekick all the time.
translation.es: Estoy harta de ser la amiga tonta a todas horas.

translation.en: It's funny. You don't seem like anyone's sidekick.
translation.es: Qué curioso, no pareces la amiga tonta de nadie.

translation.en: Can I see that picture again?
Yeah. Guys go crazy for her.
translation.es: Sí, los tíos se vuelven locos.

translation.en: No, I mean the picture itself. It's really good.
translation.es: No, me refiero a la foto. Es muy buena.

translation.en: Yeah? You have a good eye.
I just... I can't picture you hangin' out with someone like this.
translation.es: No te imagino saliendo con alguien así.

translation.en: I don't know. She looks kind of...
She makes it seem like I'm the one who's insecure. But really it's her.
translation.es: Hace como que la insegura soy yo, pero es ella en realidad.

translation.en: She's at this party. Most likely drunk and needs me to hold her hair back.
translation.es: Está en una fiesta, borracha, esperando que cuide de ella.

translation.en: I mean, so are her parents.
They're constantly out of town, so she has this revolving door of guys over.
translation.es: Están siempre fuera y ella cada día con un tío.

translation.en: Should we maybe go check it out?
Why would I wanna go to that party?
translation.es: ¿Para qué voy a ir a esa fiesta?

translation.en: Maybe show off your new tattoo?
Show Sydney that you're not the person she thinks you are?
translation.es: ¿Mostrarle a Sydney que no eres lo que ella cree?

translation.en: [man] Yo, watch out! Heads up. Comin' through.
[woman 2] You're better than this. Come on, just turn around.
translation.es: Tú eres mejor que eso, déjalo.

translation.en: [man 1] Come on, Syd, you got this.
[woman 3] Come on, Syd, you started it, you gotta finish it.
translation.es: Ya que estás, acaba el reto.

translation.en: [woman 4] Come on, you got it. You got it!
[Wes] Just take a deep breath. Just take a deep breath, Sydney.
[man 2] Get in here! She's gonna do it!
[Wes] There you go. Come on. [Chuck] Yeah, there you go!
[man 3] Come on, Syd. Focus. You got this.
Liv, Liv, Liv, come, come, come.
[Liv] What are you doing? Oh, my God!
[Wes] Come on, Syd, you don't have to do this. Come back.
translation.es: Syd, no tienes que hacer esto. Vuelve.

translation.en: [Liv] You don't have to do it.
[Wes] Take your time, Syd. Don't look down.
[Wes] Come on, we're right here. You could always turn back, Syd.
translation.es: Estamos aquí, puedes volver si quieres.

translation.en: -[Liv] JP, grab her. -Come on, you gotta film.
translation.es: Cógela. Tienes que grabarlo, si no, no vale.

translation.en: Sydney, it's not gonna count unless you film it.
translation.es: Tienes que grabarlo, si no, no vale.

translation.en: [Chuck] She has to film it! She can't...
It doesn't count unless she films it. She has to film it.
translation.es: No vale si no lo graba.

translation.en: [Chuck] She has to film it. No, but she has to film it.
-[Wes] Shut up, Chuck! -Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
[Wes] This is crazy. All right, there you go. Don't look down.
translation.es: Esto es una locura. Eso, no mires abajo.

translation.en: [breathing heavily] I can't! Oh, my God, I can't, I can't!
-You gotta do something. -Stop yelling at me!
-Stop! You're not helping. -[Wes] Chuck, shut up! Shut up, she's got it.
[Chuck] She has to get it done! [woman 1] Shut up!
Syd, it's gonna take too long, you gotta stand, you gotta walk.
[Wes] You heard her, Chuck, shut up.
She's not gonna get here in time unless you get up and walk. You have to walk.
translation.es: No llegará a tiempo si no sigue caminando.

translation.en: [Wes] Don't listen to him, Syd, you got it. [Chuck] She has to! She's wasting time!
translation.es: Ni caso, Sydney, ya lo tienes.

translation.en: [Wes] You got it. Come on, Syd, you got this.
[Sydney] I can't, I can't, I can't. I bail, I bail, I bail.
Oh, my gosh. You guys are so famous right now.
Uh-oh! Wait until Syd sees you.
translation.es: Espera a que te vea Syd.

translation.en: Yeah, she tried to walk across that ladder and just bailed.
translation.es: Intentó pasar por esa escalera pero se rindió.

translation.en: Oh, come on, Vee, you never even spoke to him.
translation.es: Vamos, Vee, no hablaste con él.
La verdad es que no me sorprende.

translation.en: Yeah, I know it's not a surprise.
translation.es: Ya sé que no es una sorpresa.

translation.en: You know what's not fine, though?
I almost died tonight, Vee, and you were nowhere to be found.
translation.es: Casi muero hoy y tú estabas desaparecida.

translation.en: I'm sorry. When you said I should live my life,
translation.es: Lo siento, cuando dijiste que viviera mi vida,

translation.en: did you mean I should live my life in your shadow?
translation.es: ¿te referías a vivirla siendo tu sombra?

translation.en: I was just trying to help you, Vee, because you're the most repressed person that I know.
translation.es: Intentaba ayudarte porque eres la persona más reprimida que conozco.

translation.en: Well, isn't that why you keep me around? Because I never tell you the truth?
translation.es: ¿Por eso me tienes a tu lado? ¿Porque nunca te digo la verdad?

translation.en: I guess you don't tell me the truth.
translation.es: Supongo que no me dices la verdad.

translation.en: Because you never told me about how insecure I am.
translation.es: Porque nunca me habías dicho que era tan insegura.

translation.en: Or about how I just have a revolving door of guys all the time.
translation.es: O que cada día me enrollo con uno. TERMINAR EL RETO DE SYDNEY 15 000 $

translation.en: You never tell me that, but you've told everyone that tonight.
translation.es: TERMINAR EL RETO DE SYDNEY 15 000 $ Nunca me lo dijiste, pero se lo dices a todos hoy.

translation.en: So please, Vee, go right ahead and show us all
translation.es: Nunca me lo dijiste, pero se lo dices a todos hoy. Por favor, Vee, demuéstranos

translation.en: what a fiery little spark plug you've become since lunch.
translation.es: lo valiente que te has vuelto desde esta mañana.

translation.en: Don't walk away from me. Vee! Wake up!
This is a game. Do you really think that someone like him is actually gonna be with you when this is all done?
translation.es: Es un juego, ¿crees que un tío así seguirá contigo después?

translation.en: -Oh, I'm sorry. You really like her now? -[Ian] Yeah, I do.
All right, come on, Syd, you're just drunk.
Tommy, it is time to get over her!
Why do you have to be such a bitch?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tienes que ser tan zorra?

translation.en: Little Vee finally speaking her mind.
translation.es: La pequeña Vee por fin dice lo que piensa.

translation.en: Do you know why we're best friends?
I do whatever you want all the time.
translation.es: Porque hacía lo que tú querías siempre.

translation.en: because I'm fun and you're boring.
translation.es: porque yo soy divertida y tú aburrida.

translation.en: The only fun thing about you was your brother.
translation.es: Lo único divertido de ti era tu hermano.

translation.en: That playing Nerve is just gonna magically make you a different person?
translation.es: ¿Que jugar a Nerve te cambiará por arte de magia?

translation.en: That's not how life works. You'll never be a Player.
translation.es: La vida no es así, nunca serás jugadora.

translation.en: I know how much you love living in the moment, Syd.
translation.es: Sé cuánto te gusta vivir el momento.

translation.en: Because you're one of those girls who peaks in high school.
translation.es: Porque eres de esas que triunfa en el instituto,

translation.en: And when you wake up one day, still living in Staten Island,
translation.es: pero te despertarás un día viviendo todavía en Staten Island,

translation.en: wondering what the hell happened to your life.
translation.es: y preguntándote qué coño has hecho en la vida.

translation.en: If you wanna know where I am from now on,
translation.es: Si quieres saber de mí a partir de ahora,

translation.en: [Ian] Wait, Vee, what are you doing?
Hey, Vee, you don't need to do this.
translation.es: No tienes por qué hacer esto.

translation.en: Look at me. Come on. Let's just go, let's bail, all right? What do you have to prove?
translation.es: Oye, abandona y vámonos. ¿Qué tienes que demostrar?

translation.en: [Chuck] Come on, you got it, Vee, please!
That's how you get into first, Vee!
I can't deal with this right now. I'm gonna go.
Vee, did you know that he's played Nerve before?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que ese tío había jugado a Nerve?

translation.en: Yeah, it was his dare to get you here and fight with Syd.
translation.es: Su reto era traerte y enfrentarte a Syd.

translation.en: That's why he brought you here.

translation.es: Mira. QUE VEE SE PELEE CON SYDNEY

translation.en: Did you take me here as part of the game?
I just lost my two best friends tonight. How much did you get for that?
translation.es: He perdido a mis dos mejores amigos. ¿Cuánto te han dado por eso?

translation.en: No, no, it's not about the money, all right?
But I promise I'll explain everything later. Just don't even bother, okay?
translation.es: - Prometo que te lo explicaré. - Ni te molestes.

translation.en: I mean, Sydney almost died tonight.
-I almost died tonight. -Vee, I know, I know.
This game is sick. I'm going to the police.
translation.es: Este juego es perverso, iré a la poli.

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Vee... -What are you doing? I'm sorry, you can't do that, all right?
You can't go to the police.
Why not? Because I'll lose the game?
You can't go to the police. It's the last thing you wanna do.
translation.es: No vayas a la policía, sería lo peor.

translation.en: Vee, wait, I wasn't trying to hurt you. It just got outta control.
translation.es: No pretendía hacerte nada malo, se ha descontrolado.

translation.en: Move! Get out of the way!
I'm playing this game. It's called Nerve.
translation.es: Estoy en un juego que se llama Nerve.

translation.en: And I'm worried that someone's gonna get really hurt. [man] Uh-oh.
translation.es: Me preocupa que alguien acabe mal.

translation.en: No, but a kid could die tonight.
Look, here, it's all on my phone. You can see.
translation.es: Mire en mi teléfono, puede verlo.

translation.en: All the money is missing from our account!
translation.es: Han vaciado nuestra cuenta del banco.

translation.en: Vee, honey, are you in trouble?
Can you just, please, tell me what's going on?
Okay, Mom, I'm gonna fix this, I promise.
but I gotta win this game.
You broke the rules. You are our prisoner.
translation.es: Has roto las reglas, eres nuestra prisionera.

translation.en: We told you not to snitch.
translation.es: Te dijimos que nada de chivarse.

translation.en: The only way out is to win the final round.
translation.es: La única salida a esto es ganar la final.

translation.en: Go to the Staten Island Ferry and the Watchers will find you.
translation.es: Ve al Ferri de Staten Island, te esperan los observadores.

translation.en: See you in the finals. See you in the finals.
Vee, thank God! Are you okay?
Am I okay? No, I'm not okay!
You need to tell me everything. Okay, what the hell is going on?
translation.es: Cuéntamelo todo. ¿De qué coño va todo esto?

translation.en: -Come here, come here. -Why is this happening to me?
'Kay, that guy Ty. We both played Nerve last year in Seattle.
translation.es: Vale. Ty y yo jugamos a Nerve el año pasado en Seattle.

translation.en: We got a dare to hang from a construction crane 200 feet in the air.
translation.es: Nuestro reto era colgarnos de una grúa a 70 metros de altura.

translation.en: The two of us and this kid named Robbie.
translation.es: Nosotros dos y un chico llamado Robby.
¡Cinco! - Cuatro, tres. - Robby, ya es suficiente.

translation.en: [Ian] Come on, Robbie, that's enough. [Ty] Shit, he's slipping.
translation.es: - Cuatro, tres. - Robby, ya es suficiente. - Dos, uno. - Se está resbalando. ¡Vuelve!

translation.en: [Robbie] Two! One! [Ty] Climb back up, man.
[Ty] Ian, grab him. [Ian] Grab my hand!
Ty and I, we bailed and we went to the cops.
translation.es: Ty y yo abandonamos y fuimos a la policía.

translation.en: We tried to get the game shut down, but they didn't do anything.
translation.es: Intentamos cerrar el juego, pero no hicieron nada.

translation.en: No, they just called it an accident.
Then the Watchers, they... They came after us for snitching.
translation.es: Luego los observadores vinieron a por nosotros por chivatos.

translation.en: They messed with my dad's job. They leaked photos of my sister online.
translation.es: Se metieron con mi padre, publicaron fotos de mi hermana.

translation.en: Me and Ty, we became Prisoners of the game.
translation.es: Nos convertimos en prisioneros del juego.

translation.en: Oh, come on. What does that even mean?
It's the third category. Watcher, Player, Prisoner.
translation.es: Es la tercera categoría. Observador, Jugador, Prisionero.

translation.en: The only way out is to win.
You and I, we're going to the final round together and I'm gonna lose.
translation.es: Iremos a la final y yo perderé.

translation.en: What? No, you can't do that.
It's already done. It's already done.
I told the Watchers to give me a dare that's gonna knock Ty outta second place.
translation.es: Pedí un reto para quitar a Ty del segundo lugar.

translation.en: It's gonna be me and you.
Yeah, I wanna take you somewhere safe. Let's go! There has to be another way.
translation.es: - Te llevaré a un lugar seguro. - Tiene que haber otra manera.

translation.en: If it's not me in the finals, then it's Ty. And he'll do anything to win.
translation.es: O soy yo en la final o es Ty. Y él hará lo que sea por ganar.

translation.en: Just tell me we're gonna do this.
Oh, my God! Vee, where are you?
Doesn't matter. I'm just glad you're okay.
translation.es: - Me alegro de que estés bien. - Vámonos.

translation.en: -All right, come on. Let's go. -[Vee] I can't.
translation.es: - Me alegro de que estés bien. - Vámonos. No puedo.

translation.en: I mean, even if they leave me alone, they're just gonna do it to somebody else.
translation.es: Aunque pasen de mí, se lo harán a otro.

translation.en: We can't stop the game if we wanted to. There's no one to stop.
It's just a bunch of anonymous people.
[Vee] Ian's doing a dare that would put him in the finals. So it could be me against him.
translation.es: Ian aceptará un reto para llegar a la final y será contra mí.

translation.en: [Sydney] Vee, do you actually trust this guy?
He is the person who got you into this mess in the first place.
translation.es: Es quien te metió en este lío.

translation.en: I got me into this mess.
translation.es: Yo me metí sola en este lío.

translation.en: Anything Ian's doing now is to help me get out.
translation.es: Ian está ayudándome a salir de él.

translation.en: [Vee] I know it sounds crazy, but I can do it.
translation.es: Sé que parece una locura, pero puedo hacerlo.

translation.en: What do you need us to do?
Tommy, you said the game is open source, right?
translation.es: Dijiste que el juego era de código abierto.

translation.en: Do you think you can change the code?
[Vee] Syd, could you buy us some?
Hang with one hand. Hang with one hand.
[Hacker Kween] Yeah, it's over here, Tommy. We don't have a lot of time.
translation.es: Es aquí, no tenemos mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Okay, yeah. We're on our way. We'll see you soon.
Yeah. I think it's gonna work. Yeah, better work.
translation.es: - Sí, creo que funcionará. - Más vale que funcione.

translation.en: Fastest Internet in New York City.
translation.es: El Internet más rápido de Nueva York.

translation.en: [Hacker Kween] Let's get this started. You ready?
-Is the botnet up and running? -Yeah, of course.
We just gotta enter it into the system.
translation.es: Hay que introducirlo en el sistema.

translation.en: Oh, and this is Sydney. Obviously.
[Sydney] Hey. [Hacker Kween] Hey. Welcome to the cloud.
All right. Let's take this game down.
It's like Wikipedia, where anyone can edit the code
translation.es: Es como la Wikipedia, cualquiera puede editar,

translation.en: but the majority has to approve it.
translation.es: pero tiene que aprobarlo la mayoría.

translation.en: And then the botnet can outvote everyone.
Yo, I got a army of bots here waitin' for orders.
-Hey, Nancy. -[Nancy] Where is Vee? What is this game?
translation.es: Hola, Nancy. ¿Dónde está Vee? ¿Qué juego es este?

translation.en: [Tommy] Don't worry, she's okay. I want you to explain it to me.
I'm gonna give you an address. Okay, if you meet me here, I'll explain everything.
translation.es: Te daré una dirección, ven y te lo cuento todo.

translation.en: All right, how many bots do we got in?
Not enough yet, but we are getting there.
[male computer] Players, show us your weapons.
Twenty seconds? HK, I need backup!
Start by just raising your gun. Just raise your gun slowly.
Then shoot me in the shoulder. I'll be fine.
What if I miss? I don't know if I can do this.
translation.es: ¿Y si fallo? No sé si sabré hacerlo.

translation.en: Oh, come on! Just shut up and play the game!
Vee, you have to hurry, all right?
You have to do this! This is the only way the game can end.
translation.es: Es la única manera de terminar.

translation.en: And then you can walk away.

translation.es: Mierda. Nos han pillado, están bloqueando nuestras IP.

translation.en: They're blockin' all of our foreign IPs!
translation.es: Nos han pillado, están bloqueando nuestras IP.

translation.en: And I say we do that dare again.
With someone who's really ready to play.
translation.es: Con alguien que juegue de verdad.

translation.en: Don't do it, Ty, it's not worth it, man.
[Ty] You have lost your mind, pretty boy!
-Get back! -Is this what you really want? For us to kill each other?
-[all] Yeah! -Of course it's what you want!
Why don't you take off your masks and show yourselves, huh?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no os quitáis las máscaras para que se os vea?

translation.en: It's easy for you to be brave in a crowd!
translation.es: Es fácil ser valiente en grupo.

translation.en: Don't you guys see that you're all still responsible for what happens tonight,
translation.es: ¿No veis que sois responsables de lo que pase hoy

translation.en: even if you are just watching?
Oh, my God! Are you really believing this bullshit?
You guys really want one of us to die? For a game?
translation.es: ¿Queréis de verdad que muramos solo por un juego?

translation.en: Who wants me to shoot her?
Who wants me to shoot her?
-All right, calm down. -[Nancy] What is this game?
I want answers! What are you doing?
You better tell me right now or I'm calling the cops.
translation.es: Dímelo ahora mismo o llamo a la policía.

translation.en: [Ty] Do you want me to shoot her?
-[all chanting] Shoot to kill! -Then vote "Yes." Shoot to kill!
Vote "Yes" if you want me to shoot her!
translation.es: ¡Votad sí si queréis que la mate!

translation.en: You want me to shoot her? You want me to shoot her?
Come on! Let's have a little bit of anarchy.
All right, we're getting around them.
The IPs are coming in faster now.
Vee, we need to go, right now!
Okay, all right. Come on, guys. Keep going.
-[crying] Oh, my God! -No, no, no, it's...
Do you hear me, Vee? Look at me, Vee, please!
Stop! It's okay. I'm okay. It's okay.
It was her plan, man. Her friend Sydney called me.
translation.es: Era su plan, tío. Su amiga Sydney me llamó.

translation.en: [Hacker Kween] That's it. The last Player's out.
[Hacker Kween] They're out. Think it's crashing!
-We got it? -And Nerve is officially offline!
translation.es: ¿Lo hemos conseguido? Nerve está oficialmente inactivo.

translation.en: You guys are the dumbest smart kids I've ever met.
translation.es: Sois los zumbados más listos que he conocido.

translation.en: No, no, I'm sorry. I'm sorry for bringing you into all this.
translation.es: No, siento yo haberte metido en esto.

translation.en: I just wish that we could've met some other way.
translation.es: Me habría gustado conocerte de otra manera.

translation.en: [Hacker Kween] Looks like I can get all your money back.
They don't call me Hacker Kween for nothin'.
translation.es: Por algo me llaman Reina del Hack.

translation.en: [Ian] Crazy first date, huh? Is that what that was? [chuckles]
translation.es: - Una primera cita de locos. - ¿Era una cita?

translation.en: [Ian] By the way, my real name is Sam.
translation.es: Por cierto, mi nombre de verdad es Sam.

translation.en: [Vee] Well, it's nice to meet you, Sam.
Hey, Vee, it's 28 degrees in New York!
